Name: Venal Soul (Chapter One)
About the game: Description: Venal Soul is an old school survival horror in First Person with limited Ammo and multiple weapons. Story: Samuel is a private detective whose sister and nephews were murdered by his brother-in-law in a fit of madness. At least that's what the police report says, but he does not believe that is true and decides to investigate on his own.
